price: 2. Voici le Livre à propos duquel il n’y a nul doute, guide pour les gens pieux,
arabic: ذَٰلِكَ ٱلۡكِتَٰبُ لَا رَيۡبَۛ فِيهِۛ هُدٗى لِّلۡمُتَّقِينَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: dhālika al-kitābu lā rayba fīhi hudan lil'muttaqīna
